plot: "A very unusual and remarkable picture of a fight between a tarantula and a scorpion. The blood-thirsty little animals are enclosed in a tin box with a glass front, and the camera photographed them at close range."
title: Fight Between Tarantula and Scorpion
plot_es: "A very unusual and remarkable picture of a fight between a tarantula and a scorpion. The blood-thirsty little animals are enclosed in a tin box with a glass front, and the camera photographed them at close range."
